title: The Best of Tom Bilyeu AMA | September 2018
description: We've compiled some of the best AMA questions from past episodes. Let us know what you think of this new series by sending us feedback to connect@impacttheory.com.  If you want your question answered by Tom in an AMA, Please submit your questions in advance to connect@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA Question”.  Be sure to follow along with Impact Theory Comics on Instagram as we continue our journey to create a studio that will rival Disney: http://bit.ly/2BwgFam   Impact Theory is proudly sponsored by: Skillshare. Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact   BOOKS MENTIONED Deep Work by Cal Newport: https://amzn.to/2plEwkb  Can't Hurt Me by David Goggins: https://amzn.to/2plHmG7   PEOPLE MENTIONED Jay Shetty - https://youtu.be/GXoErccq0vw [00:21] Michae Ovitz - https://youtu.be/SPkCj1TK4fg [7:07]   QUESTION TOPICS   Why Tom immediately (sometimes publicly) brings to light his mistakes when he catches them [00:19] How to get over the limiting belief that you're too old to do '____' [4:24] Why Cal Newport's limit of how long someone can do 'deep work' is a limiting belief [9:27] How to get over the anxiety of executing on your dreams [13:01] How to overcome social awkwardness and overcoming limiting beliefs [18:17] Tom goes through, step-by-step, how to get over from feeling lost and overwhelmed with your goals and life [21:24]
